summary: This letter discusses Valeriy Vladimirovich Kostikov's activities in Mexico, France, Spain, the U.S., and Cuba during the period 1959-61, his assignment to Mexico City as a consular officer from 1961-1965 and again in 1968, his possible involvement with Lee Harvey Oswald, and his potential connection to Department 13 (Executive Action) of the KGB.
title: Information on Valeriy Vladimirovich Kostikov
